Generated Narrative: CodeSystem ehealth-overviewUsageMode

Properties

This code system defines the following properties for its concepts

NameCodeURITypeDescription
Deprecateddeprecatedhttp://hl7.org/fhir/concept-properties#deprecateddateTimeIndicates that the concept is deprecated and should not be used

Concepts

This case-sensitive code system http://ehealth.sundhed.dk/cs/overviewUsageMode defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinitionDeprecatedDansk (Danish, da)
no-display Do not displayDo not render in overview displayIngen visning
display-all Display all itemsRender all questions and answers regardless of Questionnaire settingsVis alle spørgsmål og svar
display-item Display itemRender item in overview displayVis spørgsmål og svar
display-result Display resultRender result for item in overview displayVis måling
no-item-display Do not render item in overview displayDo not render item in overview display2022-03-17Vis ikke elementet i oversigtsvisning
no-result-display Do not render result for item in overview displayDo not render result for item in overview display2022-03-17Vis ikke måledata for elementet i oversigtsvisning

name: overviewUsageMode
title: Overview usage mode
description: Identifies whether the specified element and/or results of the element should appear in overview or table presentation.

property.description: Indicates that the concept is deprecated and should not be used

concept.definition: Do not render in overview display
Render all questions and answers regardless of Questionnaire settings
Render result for item in overview display

concept.display: Do not render item in overview display
concept.definition: Do not render item in overview display

concept.display: Do not render result for item in overview display
concept.definition: Do not render result for item in overview display

designation.value: Vis ikke måledata for elementet i oversigtsvisning
